title: My Son Ruined His Brother's Project
description:
Sara asked one of her sons to turn in his brother's forgotten homework assignment and she's upset with him that he failed to do so. - Dr. Laura: "Set the right example for your boys by showing them what being accountable looks like."

Do you model the behaviors you expect your children to have? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
